ROW.DATDSC: --select to_char(crtdat,'YYMMDD HH24:MI') ,crtusr,title from msg --where tousr='[%SYS_USRID]' and sysdate-crtdat<NVL(RESDAT,0) order by crtdat desc select 1,1,1 from dual

ROW.NAME: 我的代办事项
ROW.DATDSC:
select * from(select e.name type,cc.name||' '||to_char(a.crtdat,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi')||chr(10)||a.title name,'Layout.sp?id=trkquery&trkguid='||a.guid url,o.action，a.guid,cc.name tousrnam from trkhdr a,v_usr c ,trktyp e,v_usr cc,trkdtl d,oalog o where a.dtlusr=c.id and a.AIMORG=c.orgid and a.crtusr=cc.id and a.AIMORG=cc.orgid and a.show =e.id and o.bilid=a.guid and o.usrid=c.id and c.id=lower('[%SYS_USRID]') and c.orgid='[%SYS_ORGID]' and a.guid = d.trkguid(+) and a.stat<>'3' /* 0￡oD??¨￡?1￡o′|àí?D￡?2￡oò?′|àí￡?3￡o′|àííê￡?4￡o?′′|àí */ and a.show not in ('4') and nvl(d.dtltyp,'1') <>'2'/*不包含评论*/ and e.id not in ('4','5','6','7','8','9','10','16','17','13') and a.crtdat<=sysdate and a.crtdat>=add_months(sysdate,-3) and o.action not in('结束') group by a.title,cc.name,a.crtdat,a.note,a.guid,a.id,o.action ,e.name order by nvl(max(d.crtdat),a.crtdat) desc) union all select MWNAME type,FROMUSRNAM||' '||to_char(CRTDAT,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi')||chr(10)||TITLE name,URL,ACTIONID,guid,tousrnam from wfmsg where tousrid='[%SYS_USRID]' and endflg='0' and org='[%SYS_ORGID]'
union all select MWNAME type,FROMUSRNAM||' '||to_char(CRTDAT,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi')||chr(10)||TITLE name,URL,ACTIONID action,guid,tousrnam from wfmsg where torolid in (select c.id rolid from usr a,usrrol b,rol c where a.guid=b.usr and b.rol=c.guid and a.org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and a.id='[%SYS_USRID]') and tousrid is null and endflg='0' and org='[%SYS_ORGID]'
